DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether train teacher staff Incredible Years ( IY ) Teacher Classroom Management ( TCM ) program reduce behavior problem promote social competence student age 6-8 year ( school ) child age 3-6 year ( day-care ) . To examine group difference baseline 8-9 month , quasi-experimental control group design pre- post-measurements use .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation IY TCM Program Norwegian School Day-care Settings
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation Incredible Years ( IY ) Teacher Classroom Management ( TCM ) program implement school-wide preventive intervention regular school day-care setting , potential change negative behavior child age 3 - 8 year . Forty-four school recruit ; comprise 1518 student age 6-8 year , 91 day-care unit comprise 1049 child age 3-6 year . Multilevel analyze use examine group differences pre-post change behavior problem measure Sutter-Eyberg Student Behavior Inventory-Revised ( SESBI-R ) Teacher Report Form ( TRF ) , well group difference pre-post change social behavior measure Social Skills Rating System ( SSRS ) . For secondary finding , group difference pre-post change teacher- student teacher-children relationship measure Student-Teacher Relationship Scale ( STRS ) ( teacher N= 444 ) , teacher-parents interaction measure Teacher-Parent Involvement Questionnaire ( INVOLVE-T/P ) ( parent N = 2109 ) , well group difference pre-post change teacher self- collective efficacy measure Norwegian Teacher Self-Efficacy Scale ( NTSES ) Collective Efficacy Scale ( CES ) ( teacher N = 3240 ) .
DOC.criteria: Schools meet predefined criterion program implementation IY TCM ( intervention ) school implement IY program ( comparison ) . Students/children age 38 year ( 7 randomly select class ) parent speak Norwegian . Teachers staff work students/children age 38 year . Schools meet predefined criterion program implementation IY TCM . Students/children age 38 year parent speak Norwegian . Teachers staff work students/children age 38 year , know students/children few 3 week .
